amendment.description: Amendment requires that the President's supplemental budget must include proposals to consolidate duplicative agency functions and proposals for cost-savings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-8 to require one of the additional policies presented in the supplemental budget to be an evaluation of duplicative agencies and proposals to consolidate them for cost-savings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
